languages.text:
Cyber Mastif has +10 Weapon Skill and Strength, and +200% Damage
{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehended{/g} enemy at the start of its turn must succeed at Toughness -{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} test, or Cyber Mastiff attacks this enemy with +100% Damage.
Protected ally gains Combat Master effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Mastif has +10 Weapon Skill and Strength, and +200% Damage
{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehended{/g} enemy at the start of its turn must succeed at Toughness -{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} test, or Cyber Mastiff attacks this enemy with +100% Damage.
Protected ally gains Combat Master effect.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} и наносит на 200% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g} выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. В случае провала кибермастиф атакует ее, нанося на 100% больше урона.
Союзник {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} получает эффект {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}мастер боя{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 Weapon Skill and Strength and deals +200% more damage.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's turn, that enemy must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −<u>cyber-mastiff's STR bonus</u> penalty. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%200 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Göz hapsindeki{/g} düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Testi geçemezse siber mastifin bu düşmana saldırıları +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} dost birim, {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}çatışma ustası{/g} etkisini kazanır.

traits.locale_text:
Siber mastif, +10 Silah Yeteneği ve Kuvvet niteliği kazanır. +%200 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Göz hapsindeki{/g} düşman, turunun başlangıcında −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Testi geçemezse siber mastifin bu düşmana saldırıları +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} dost birim, {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}çatışma ustası{/g} etkisini kazanır.

Siber mastif, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%200 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Göz hapsindeki{/g} düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Testi geçemezse siber mastifin bu düşmana saldırıları +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} dost birim, {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}çatışma ustası{/g} etkisini kazanır.

languages.text:
El cibermastín recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} e inflige un +200 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. Si falla, el cibermastín ataca al enemigo y le inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
El aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} gana el efecto {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maestría del combate{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
El cibermastín recibe +10 de Habilidad de armas y Fuerza e inflige un +200 % de daño adicional.
Al comienzo del turno del enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este debe realizar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. Si falla, el cibermastín ataca al enemigo y le inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
El aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} gana el efecto {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maestría del combate{/g}.

El cibermastín recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} e inflige un +200 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. Si falla, el cibermastín ataca al enemigo y le inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
El aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} gana el efecto {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maestría del combate{/g}.

languages.text:
生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高200%。
当被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，该名敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则生化獒犬会立刻攻击该名敌人，造成的伤害提高100%。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友获得{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}战斗大师{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
生化獒犬的力量、武器技能提高10点，造成的伤害提高200%。
当被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的敌人回合开始时，该名敌人需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}减值。若未能通过检定，则生化獒犬会立刻攻击该名敌人，造成的伤害提高100%。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友获得{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}战斗大师{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und verursacht +200 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegners muss dieser Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} bestehen. Scheitert er, greift der Cyber-Mastiff an und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützte{/g} Verbündete erhält den Effekt {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Kampfmeister{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +10 Waffenfähigkeit und Stärke und verursacht +200 % mehr Schaden.
Zu Beginn des Zuges des {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegners muss dieser Gegner eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} bestehen. Scheitert er, greift der Cyber-Mastiff an und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützte{/g} Verbündete erhält den Effekt {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Kampfmeister{/g}.

Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und verursacht +200 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefassten{/g} Gegners muss dieser Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} bestehen. Scheitert er, greift der Cyber-Mastiff an und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden.
Der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützte{/g} Verbündete erhält den Effekt {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Kampfmeister{/g}.

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +10 et inflige +200 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g}, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}malus{/g} de -{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. En cas d'échec, le cyber-mastiff attaque l'ennemi et lui inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
L'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} gagne l'effet {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maître du combat{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de Capacité de combat et de Force de +10 et inflige +200 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Au début du tour de l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g}, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec un malus de -{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}. En cas d'échec, le cyber-mastiff attaque l'ennemi et lui inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
L'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} gagne l'effet {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Maître du combat{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が+10され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+200%上昇する。
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、その敵は−{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、サイバーマスチフは敵を攻撃し、+100%のダメージを与える。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方は、{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}戦闘の達人{/g}の効果を付与される。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +200% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
At the start of the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the cyber-mastiff attacks the enemy, dealing +100% more damage.
The {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally gains the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}combat master{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフの武器スキルと腕力が+10され、与えるダメージが+200%上昇する。
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵のターン開始時、その敵は−{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、サイバーマスチフは敵を攻撃し、+100%のダメージを与える。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方は、{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}戦闘の達人{/g}の効果を付与される。

サイバーマスチフの武器スキルと腕力が+10され、与えるダメージが+200%上昇する。
{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵のターン開始時、その敵は−{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、サイバーマスチフは敵を攻撃し、+100%のダメージを与える。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方は、{g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}戦闘の達人{/g}の効果を付与される。
